title: Amazon Product Scraper
subtitle: Search for products on Amazon and view the first page results
searchPlaceholder: Enter product keyword (e.g., laptop, headphones, books...)
searchInfo: Press Enter or click Search to find products
errorMessage: Failed to search products. Please try again.
noProductsError: No products found for "{{keyword}}". Try a different search term.
keywordTooShort: Search keyword must be at least 2 characters long

searchSubtitle: Enter a product name and select your preferred Amazon country
footerTech: Built with Bun, Vite & Tailwind CSS
searchDescription: Enter at least 2 characters to search for products
countryDescription: Choose which Amazon region to search in
